home.name: Hello, I am Romain Frezier.
home.role: I am a 4th year engineering student in Computer Science and Management at Polytech Montpellier, France.
home.roleDescription: I'm currently doing a 3-month internship in Stockholm, Sweden.

contact.serious: Don't hesitate to contact me for any internship or job proposal, or for any other information.
contact.fun: You can also contact me if you don't find the secret feature :)

about.title: About Me
about.aboutme1: Lover of sports, including mountain sports such as hiking, ski touring or others. I really enjoy taking long outings and pushing my physical and/ or mental limits on each of these outings, as well as photographing mountain landscapes.
about.aboutme2: I am currently a volunteer in the student sports association at Polytech Montpellier, and I hold the position of hiking manager.

resume.title: Curriculum Vitae
resume.subtitle: You can download my resume here

items.name: TOEIC
items.description: The Test of English for International Communication (TOEIC) is an international standardized test of English language proficiency for non-native speakers. It is intentionally designed to measure the everyday English skills of people working in an international environment. I scored 920/990.

items.name: Enterprise Design Thinking Co-Creator
items.description: As a co-creator, I am an active contributor to Enterprise Design Thinking projects. I help bring concrete user outcomes to life by developing collaborative skills and finding opportunities to step up and lead.

items.name: Enterprise Design Thinking Practitioner
items.description: I have acquired knowledge about the application of Enterprise Design Thinking and its value. As a practitioner, I find opportunities to experiment with it in my daily work.

items.name: Nuit de l'Info 2022
items.description: La Nuit de l'Info is a national competition that brings together students, teachers and companies to work together on the development of a web application.

items.name: Apple Teacher
items.description: Apple Teacher is a free professional learning program designed to support and celebrate educators using Apple products for teaching and learning. As an Apple Teacher, I have learned how to use Apple products for teaching and learning.

items.name: AWI Project
items.description: The Mobile project is a project that we had to do during our 4th year of engineering school. The goal of this project is to create an REST API that will be used by a mobile app on iOS.

items.name: AWI Project
items.languages: Angular, Firebase, Express, MongoDB, Node.js, TypeScript
items.description: The AWI (Web Application and Interoperability) project is a project that we had to do during our 4th year of engineering school. The goal of this project is to create an REST API that will be used by a web.

items.name: Data Science Project
items.languages: Python, PySpark, Pandas, AWS S3, AWS Athena, SQL, Maths
items.description: Creation of an infographic to answer a question posed by Open Data University: Is the distribution of recharging infrastructures for electric vehicles appropriate in France?

items.name: Software Engineering Project
items.description: Software Engineering project, design, modeling and development in Java. The project concerns the realization of an application in Java connecting people wishing to practice a sport activity with people wishing to accompany them. We tried to respect the SOLID design principles, as well as the basic design principles of Java. Moreover, we used many design patterns seen in the course.

contact-me: You can contact me for any internship or job proposal, or for any other information.

items.name: C Project
items.description: Realization of a messaging service on a local network in C language in pairs. The project took place in the form of a sprint, in which certain functionalities were imposed, and a deliverable had to be submitted at the end of each sprint. The last sprint left us the choice on the features we wanted to implement.

items.name: WEB Project
items.description: Realization of a complete web application in 20 days on a free theme, in fullstack. The choice of the subject turned to an application making it possible to save a person's sports activities, to consult their statistics, to follow the wear and tear of their equipment as well as to find out about the competitions available.

items.name: IoT Project
items.description: Free subject for each pair. Realization of a sports assistant allowing to coach a sportsman during the exercise, as well as a website to save and consult the data relating to the training. The sports assistant uses several sensors such as an ultrasonic sensor, buttons, but also an LCD screen.

items.name: Algorithmic Project
items.description: Make the functional specifications and the main program of a game (Quarto) by pair, recover the functional specifications and the main program of another game (Mabula) from another pair and do the development.
